Description copied from interface: J3DTopologyObject

Returns:
The Group node use to attach child objects.

getInternalAttachmentNode

protected final javax.media.j3d.Group getInternalAttachmentNode()
Return the default group to which all derived class geometry should be attached to. All nodes attached to this group will be correctly handled in terms of visibility and transparency.

Returns:
The group to which all sub-classes geometry should be attached to.

getRootAppearance

protected javax.media.j3d.Appearance getRootAppearance()
Returns the Appearance that is used to implement colour and transparency. Sub-classes geometry should use this Appearance to ensure colour and transparency are correctly handled.

Returns:
The Appearance used to implement colour and transparency.
